comments:
This bug is a follow-up to bug 193503.

The test CDescriptorTests.testConcurrentDescriptorCreation2() fails occasionally.

Mikhail, I don't think this is very important for 4.0.1. So, if you'd like to postpone, I'm OK with it.

> Mikhail, I don't think this is very important for 4.0.1. So, if you'd like to

OK, I'll re-target it to 4.0.2

Thanks,
Mikhail
